text: James Hamilton Riddell (6 February 1891 – unknown) was a Scottish footballer who played for Rangers, Dumbarton, Clyde, Partick Thistle, Kilmarnock, St Mirren, Millwall, Fulham, Wigan Borough and Caernarfon. ==References== Category:1891 births Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Partick Thistle F.C. players Category:Clyde F.C. players Category:Rangers F.C. players Category:Kilmarnock F.C. players Category:Fulham F.C. players Category:Millwall F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players Category:St Mirren F.C. players Category:Year of death missing Category:Association football midfielders
title: James Riddell (footballer)
